item.title: Taxpayer-Funded Schools Can’t Prohibit Prayer And Promote Witchcraft
item.description: What looks like harmless exploration of 'different beliefs' is reprogramming the moral compass of the next generation.

item.title: Alaska Schools’ Social Studies Standards Omit Washington, Lincoln, And Christianity
